thread.section_title: Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A lovely hotel
thread.title_full: A lovely hotel - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Yihui R
title: A lovely hotel
text: Stay for two nights. It's close to the time square and Broadway theaters. The room is a little small comparing to the usual countryside hotels, but about the same size as the hotel rooms in Europe. The hotel staffs are very polite and kind. The hotel provides free food in the morning and afternoon, with very good bakery and juice.
